definition: to pass the provincial level imperial examination
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed

sentences.english: You should include some examples in the text.
sentences.chinese: 你應該在文章中舉一些例子。

sentences.english: We aren't able to accumulation the third ad fifth items .
sentences.chinese: 第三中舉五項目，我們沒有貨供給。

sentences.english: He lifts up the poor from the dust and the needy from the ash heap.
sentences.chinese: 從塵埃裏提拔弱小的人，由糞土中舉揚窮苦的人。

sentences.english: Startling new inventions have never come about by designing for the norm.
sentences.chinese: 驚人的新發明從未在中規中舉中產生。

sentences.english: A fallen warrior forms the base of the triangle, his severed arm holds a broken sword.
sentences.chinese: 三角形底部是一位倒地的戰士，斷臂中舉着一柄斷劍。

sentences.english: He  overcharged the lecture with too many examples.
sentences.chinese: 他在演講中舉的例子太多了。
